pr_title: Add support for bearer tokens in Jenkins CLI

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible that the bearer token here is empty ?
timeline.author: sladyn98

replies.bodyText: From my understanding of CLI class, it can be an empty string but not null -- follows the semantics of basicAuth
replies.author: sorend

timeline.author: sladyn98

timeline.bodyText: Would it be better if we also include  an Empty Bearer Token test ?

replies.bodyText: I can add the test, but the cli will behave in the same was as if empty auth is passed to basicAuth, semantics are the same. Suggest not to implement test, but open to your suggestion :-)
replies.author: sorend

replies.bodyText:
Okay, I do not have a deep understanding of basicAuth here, if I understand correctly if empty token is passed it will be handled normally and therefore we do not need to test it. Might need some additional review
CC @daniel-beck
